Question: This person had been reluctant to publish his calculus because he feared controversy and criticism.
Hints: This is known as this person's theory of colour.
This person died in his sleep in London on 20 March 1727 (OS 20 March 1726; NS 31 March 1727) and was buried in Westminster Abbey.
This tract contained the nucleus that this person developed and expanded to form the Principia.
